headline.main: Middle East Stage Set; Multiple Allied Command Is Viewed As Possible Flaw if Clash Comes

lead_paragraph: As stubborn Soviet resistance and a sticky morass of Russian mud halted or slowed the German "push to the East" yesterday, the stage was being set in the Middle Eastern theatre of war for another act in the great drama of the Levant.
abstract: H W Baldwin on possible Middle East battlefield

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: As stubborn Soviet resistance and a sticky morass of Russian mud halted or slowed the German "push to the East" yesterday, the stage was being set in the Middle Eastern theatre of war for another act in the great drama of the Levant....
